    Become Great at R

    Here’s What gmlang.com is All About

    At gmlang.com, my goal is to make you great at R. I do this by sharing what I know and what I learn everyday. If you want to become better at R, I invite you to join our community to learn and share.

    Introducing Your Chief R Officer

    My full name is Guangming Lang, and my nickname is gmlang. I’m a data scientist and the founder of cabaceo, a data science consulting company. I have a master’s degree in biostatistics from the University of Michigan and a bachelor’s degree in math from the New College of Florida. I won the prestigious national science foundation graduate research fellowship award in 2009, the same award Steven Levitt won when he was a graduate student. I’m passionate about the R programming language. This blog is my platform for sharing my knowledge about R and Data Analysis.

    Thanks for visiting my site. Free free to email me: gmlang [at] cabaceo [dot] com.
